TopicTitle: Placeholder Text in Transform Tool Context Menu

Articles.Content:
Version: 0.1.0.0.20892

Computer Specs
OS: Windows 11 22H2
CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
GPU: Nvidia GTX 1660 6GB
RAM: 16GB

When clicking on the transform tool, a tiny window appears for the alignment of the tool between Absolute and Local, but the text for it is seemingly missing and it's instead showing placeholder text. The icons also display in a different color and with different padding compared to the rest of the buttons.

The assembly alignment also does not impact the snapping in any way. It is currently impossible to align 2 surface mounted parts exactly opposite one another without using symmetry settings to do so. If you want to align some things in a non-standard symmetry, or different parts - anything that takes more than one placement step - it is currently not possible to do so exactly. All snapping is local, alignment setting only affects the direction of the translate arrows.
